hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah said:"The Messenger of Allah cursed the woman who tattoos and the one tattooed, the woman who fixed hair extensions and the one who had her hair get extended, the consumer of Riba and the one who pays it, and Al-Muhallil and Al-Muhallal Lahu

chapter.ara-name: باب إِحْلاَلِ الْمُطَلَّقَةِ ثَلاَثًا وَمَا فِيهِ مِنَ التَّغْلِيظِ
chapter.eng-name: Making A Thrice-Divorced Woman Lawful (To Return To Her First Husband), And The Stern Warning Concer
